definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 餡餅|馅饼[xian4 bing3]
erhua variant of 露餡|露馅[lou4 xian4]

sentences.english: The filling is usually composed of different kinds of fruit kernels and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 里面包上各种果仁和糖做成的馅儿。

sentences.english: Her veneer of politeness began to crack.
sentences.chinese: 她那彬彬有礼的伪装开始露馅儿了。

sentences.english: It makes a superb filling for cakes and sponges.
sentences.chinese: 它非常适合做蛋糕和软布丁的馅儿。

sentences.english: The paper-thin crust serves as the wrapper of the stuffing.
sentences.chinese: 纸一般的面皮是用来包那些馅儿的。

sentences.english: 'Never use ground meat,' she told me. 'They will always give you a bad cut.'
sentences.chinese: “千万别用牛肉，”她告诉我，“那种馅儿不好弄。”

sentences.english: The best I can say of Irish pub food is that it’s filling.
sentences.chinese: 我最想要说的关于爱尔兰酒吧食物就是它的馅儿。

sentences.english: More exactly, it's made with sticky rice flour filled with sweet stuffing.
sentences.chinese: 确切地说，是用糯米粉做的，里面还有馅儿呢。

sentences.english: Which sweet stuffing tastes more delicious ?
I can make the filling according to my own taste.
sentences.chinese: 我可以根据自己的口味调馅儿。

definition: shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
